name: jparse
description: JSON parser API and tools written in C

jparse.description: JSON scanner in flex grammar form
JSON parser in bison grammar form

tools.name: jstrencode
tools.description: tool to encode a string for JSON

tools.description: tool to decode JSON encoded strings

tools.name: verge
tools.description: tool to determine if first version is greater or equal to the second version

tools.name: jnum_chk
tools.description: tool to check JSON number string conversions

tools.name: jnum_gen
tools.description: tool to generate JSON number string conversion test data

tools.name: jsemtblgen
tools.description: tool to generate JSON semantics table
